last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Lullably
last_episode_to_air.overview: Horse leaps into the Nowhere King's mind and learns his haunting backstory. Meanwhile, Rider and the herd come up with a plan.

name: Centaurworld
overview: Centaurworld follows a war horse who is transported from her embattled world to a strange land inhabited by silly, singing centaurs of all species, shapes, and sizes. Desperate to return home, she befriends a group of these magical creatures and embarks on a journey that will test her more than any battle she's ever faced before.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: On a quest to reunite with her trusty rider, a fearless war horse journeys through a whimsical world filled with magic, adventure and singing centaurs.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Horse embarks on a mission to build an army and defeat the Nowhere King. It won't be easy, but she's got the herd by her side — and Rider back home.

episodes.name: Hello Rainbow Road
episodes.overview: Separated from her Rider during battle, Horse wakes up in a colorful world filled with strange beasts. But where is her trusty friend?

episodes.name: Fragile Things
episodes.overview: The herd sets out to find the way home. Wammawink encourages them to be careful and take it slow, but fearless Horse charges ahead.

episodes.name: The Key
episodes.overview: Horse meets Waterbaby — one of Centaurworld's shamans — and learns about the key: a mysterious object that could reunite her with Rider.

episodes.name: What You Need
episodes.overview: Searching for the next piece of the key, Horse leads the herd into a mysterious forest to see the tree shamans. They grant wishes — but there's a catch.

episodes.name: It's Hidin' Time
episodes.overview: The friends seek shelter in a cave during a storm... but they're not alone. While looking for an exit, they discover strange paintings on the walls.

episodes.name: Holes: Part 2
episodes.overview: The group follows the Rainbow Road into a deep, dark hole, where a Moletaur locks them in jail and informs them that they'll face the judge.

episodes.name: Johnny Teatime's Be Best Competition: A Quest for the Sash
episodes.overview: Zulius brings the herd to Cataur Valley, where the shaman is fuzzy but fierce. To earn a piece of the key, Horse goes glam for a silly competition.

episodes.name: Ride the Whaletaur Shaman!
episodes.overview: Horse hopes to find the final shaman in Merfolk Town. But she's growing discouraged — and looking more and more like a centaur every day.

episodes.name: The Rift (1)
episodes.overview: The herd makes it to the Rift and reminisces about their time together while waiting for Waterbaby to arrive with the final piece of the key.

episodes.name: The Rift (2)
episodes.overview: Horse and Rider face a frightening enemy. Back in Centaurworld, the herd summons up the courage to enter the void and fight for their friend.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: On a quest to reunite with her trusty rider, a fearless war horse journeys through a whimsical world filled with magic, adventure and singing centaurs.

episodes.name: Horsatia Wighair Beansz?
episodes.overview: Horse tries to recruit an army to defend Centaurworld, but no one wants to join. The herd visits the Horsetaurs' castle to see if they'll help.

episodes.name: All Herd All the Terd
episodes.overview: Up in their cloud condo complex, the Birdtaurs have been obsessively watching the herd: Horse and friends are their favorite reality stars!

guest_stars.character: Message Bird / Bayden / Old Man / Hanglydangly (voice)
guest_stars.name: Grey DeLisle

episodes.name: My Tummy, Your Hurts
episodes.overview: Horse tries to enlist the fierce Coldtaurs in her battle — but they capture Glendale! Back in the human world, Waterbaby sends a message to Rider.

episodes.name: Holes: Part 3
episodes.overview: On a trip to the Underground Kingdom, Horse learns that Rider has a magnificent new horse named Becky Apples. Would Rider really replace her?

episodes.name: Bunch O' Scrunch
episodes.overview: Horse discovers a powerful ability: She can jump into backstories! And seeing the tough times her herd friends faced helps her feel less alone.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Becky Apples
episodes.overview: Rider defies the general's orders and goes to the Nowhere King's castle to get the artifact. But her new horse, Becky Apples, isn't exactly cooperative.

episodes.name: The Hootenanny
episodes.overview: All of Centaurworld's residents gather for the hootenanny. But can Horse turn this colorful collection of creatures into a fearless army?

episodes.name: The Last Lullably
episodes.overview: Horse leaps into the Nowhere King's mind and learns his haunting backstory. Meanwhile, Rider and the herd come up with a plan.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Horse embarks on a mission to build an army and defeat the Nowhere King. It won't be easy, but she's got the herd by her side — and Rider back home.
